#summary The Contacts Example - Step 1

This sequence of tutorials assumes that you're using version 2.4 of the [https://developers.google.com/web-toolkit/download Google Web Toolkit] and the associated [https://developers.google.com/eclipse/ Eclipse plugin].

  * Import the dark-matter-data project into your workspace.<p/>The SVN URL is `https://dark-matter-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/`. <p>Note: the eclipse project is below the `dark-matter-data` folder beneath `trunk` and is also called `dark-matter-data`.<p/>
  * Create a new Web Application Project with name `contacts1` and package `com.example`<p/>
  * Right click the `contacts1` project and select `Build Path->Configure Build Path...`<p/>
  * Select the `Projects` tab. Click `Add...` <br>
   Select the `dark-matter-data` project and hit `Ok`<p/>
  * Select the `Libraries` tab. Click `Add JARs...`
   Expand the `dark-matter-data` project <br>
   Expand the `extjars` folder <br>
   Select the `gwteventservice-1.1.1.jar` and hit `Ok`
  * In your source tree, beneath `com.example.contacts` edit the `Contacts.gwt.xml` file (in text mode) and add the following beneath the "Other module inherits" section <p/>
{{{
  <inherits name="de.novanic.eventservice.GWTEventService"/>

  <inherits name="org.dmd.darkmatterprotocol"/>
}}}
  * For now, you can also disable the GWT logging mechanism (which is used by the `darkmatterprotocol` module) by adding the following just above the end of module (`</module`>) statement<p/>
  ` <set-property name="gwt.logging.enabled" value="FALSE"/>`
  * The next step is to add support for the services implied by the entries we added to the `Contacts.gwt.xml` configuration.<p/>
  Beneath the `contacts1` project, open the `war` folder <br>
  Open the `WEB-INF` folder <br>
  Edit the `web.xml` file (in text mode)<p/>
  * Add the following servlet definitions:<p/>
{{{
  <!-- The GWT Event Service -->
  <servlet>
      <servlet-name>eventServiceImpl</servlet-name>
      <servlet-class>de.novanic.eventservice.service.EventServiceImpl</servlet-class>
  </servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
      <servlet-name>eventServiceImpl</servlet-name>
      <url-pattern>/contacts1/gwteventservice</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

  <!-- The Dark Matter Protocol Service - Reference Implementation -->
  <servlet>
    <servlet-name>DMPServlet</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.dmpservletri.DMPServiceImpl</servlet-class>
    <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
  </servlet>
  
  <servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>DMPServlet</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/contacts1/DMP</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

}}}
<p/>
  * Directly beneath the `war` folder create a new text file called `dmpServletplugins.oif` and add the following content:<p/>
{{{
PluginConfig
pluginName		cache
pluginClass		org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.plugins.BasicCachePlugin

PluginConfig
pluginName		security
pluginClass		org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.plugins.BasicSecurityPlugin

PluginConfig
pluginName		requestTracker
pluginClass		org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.plugins.BasicRequestTrackerPlugin
}}}
